job_title: Product Manager/Program Manager – Contractual and Commercial Expertise
jd: From: Asha Jyothi, Propelsys asha@propelsys.com Reply to: asha@propelsys.com Job Title: Product Manager/Program Manager – Contractual and Commercial Expertise Location: US (Houston/Austin preferred) Required Skills: ·Program/Project Management: 3-7 years of experience in product or program management roles. ·Contractual/Commercial Space Knowledge: Experience or familiarity with contractual or commercial processes (pricing, quoting, etc.). ·Strong Communication Skills: Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, driving clarity and consensus. ·Team Leadership: Proven ability to bring together diverse teams and align them towards common goals. ·Tools Expertise: Proficient in using JIRA for managing epics, features, and user stories. Familiarity with Signavio or other process mapping tools is a plus. ·Agile Methodologies: Comfortable working in Agile environments, managing backlogs, and ensuring successful execution.
